Description:
Hidden Gem
A beautifully finished property set in a peaceful location, close to schools and shops.
The interior gives off a bright, classical feel as you walk into the home through a formal entry. This leads to a large lounge/family room to one side and 3 extremely roomy double sized bedrooms all with built in robes to the other side. This home also features a brand new bathroom and spacious kitchen with meals area. You can enjoy a BBQ in the private terrace/courtyard, and there's also a good sized workshop/shed. Suited to investors and first-home buyers alike, this home offers plenty of potential.

Here's One For The Investor!
Tenanted at $330p/w this 3 bedroom unit is an excellent purchase.

Description:
BUILD YOUR DREAM HOME!
What a fantastic sized block to build your dream home! Don't miss out on an opportunity to secure 605m2 (approx.) of quality land. Located in the Mornington Peninsula's booming and yet still tranquil Crib Point. Within easy walking distance to shops, Crib Point Primary School and Morradoo Train Station. Only a 3 minute drive to HMAS Cerberus Naval Base and Stony Point ferry. Surrounded by some of the best beaches and wineries that the Mornington Peninsula has to offer such as Balnarring, Somers and Shoreham. This quiet and established spot is perfect for your family! Genuine motivated vendor, will consider reasonable offers.
Contact Exclusive Agent Ken Brown on 0402 868 368.

Address: 352 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
Description:
Under Offer
Are Privacy & Presentation Important To You?
Situated in the heart of Crib Point and surrounded by picturesque established gardens, this well presented three bedroom residence provides everything required for an excellent investment or fantastic first home. It boasts a generous formal lounge and dining area, whilst an adjacent renovated kitchen and spacious dining/living area provides the ideal space for family meals which leads out to an impressive outdoor entertaining area - that has been well planned to provide plenty of room to entertain friends in style. The master bedroom features a lovely garden outlook, a further two bedrooms are spacious and centrally located to the family bathroom completes the package. All set behind a large established hedged fence with security gates this home is ready for you to move in and enjoy. Conveniently located, it is close to shops, schools, public transport and some of the best restaurants and wineries the Mornington Peninsula has to offer.
Call Jason Dowler today on 0403 598 754 to arrange your private inspection or for more information.

Description:
BEST VALUE IN CRIB POINT!
This well presented very affordable home on 613m2 (approx) allotment will tempt any astute buyer whether you are looking to invest or nest. The home features three bedrooms all with built in robes, softwood flooring throughout, Natural window furnishings and paint tones enhance this lovely home that is situated on 611m2 allotment. North facing sash windows allow ample light. There will be a fully renovated bathroom, the country style kitchen has an Emila dishwasher, gas stove and looks out to the rear deck area and the English country cottage gardens, with a vegetable and herb patch. Outside boasts gravel driveway leading to a single carport, tucked away at the rear of the yard is a double garage with power and a remote control door and also a small garden shed. Another feature is the lovely private decked area that continues around to the side of the home, nestled away is an outdoor spa. This well maintained home that presents beautifully and is full of natural light is certainly a Budget Pleaser and Won't Last Long! For more details please Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.
Like our Facebook page www.facebook.com/century21hastings

Description:
Under Offer
Stylish Family Living!
Ideally located in a quiet court location in leafy Crib Point this fully renovated 4 bedroom home set on a 690m2 (approx.) allotment & only minutes to shops, schools & transport is an opportunity not to be missed!
Featuring multiple living zones, modern central bathroom & a state of the art gourmet kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & walk-in pantry will suit the entertainer at heart. While accommodating the largest of family's is a breeze with a large master bedroom featuring walk-in robe & contemporary ensuite while the remaining 3 bedrooms all have built-in robes.
While outside enjoy the private rear yard with paved entertainment area, undercover hard wood deck landing & large workshop or car accommodation with mains power. Special features include hard wood flooring through-out, gas ducted heating & split system cooling.
Located so close to all amenities & ready to move in with-out a thing to do this property is a must to inspect!

Description:
Under Offer
Affordable living on 1000m2 plus!
Located in leafy Crib Point, surrounded by quality homes & recreational parks, this solid 3 bedroom brick veneer home set on a generous 1000m2 (approx.) will suit first home buyers, tradies, retires & investors alike. Featuring built in robes in all 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, open plan living & dining with functional galley style kitchen & breakfast bar. While outside the separate double lock-up garage & rear yard access to the huge back yard will accommodate a multitude of family, trade or recreational pursuits.
Special features include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, wood fire Coonara & loads of room for off street parking & rear yard access. All within a short commute to local beaches, shopping & wineries this property is a must to inspect.

Description:
Cute As A Button On 1227m2 Allotment!
This fantastic 3 bedroom Cedar home is just waiting for you to occupy. Completely rebuilt from top to toe with a large brand new kitchen fitted out with quality appliances, new bathroom, freshly painted, all bedrooms have BIR's, new flooring all adding up to maintenance free living. The home is located in a quiet court setting with easy stroll to shops and transport. I have described the beautiful home but there is also is a very appealing block of approx 1227m2 with a park like feel and very private. Outside also boasts a single room bungalow ideally suited for a teenager, two garden sheds, single carport and all the boundaries are well fenced. A Must See! Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.
Like our Facebook page www.facebook.com/century21hastings

Description:
Under Offer
The Secret Garden (1600sqm approx)
This immaculate log cabin is situated in a sought after pocket with all the peace and quiet a country abode would have. On a large allotment of 1600sqm (approx) and a unique feel you couldn't replicate makes this hidden gem well suited to all families, young couples, investors and anyone after that country feel. Comprising: 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, laundry, 3 deck areas to enjoy the serenity, large storage shed, garden shed, car port, huge yard and dual car access ideal for a boat or caravan. Special features include: gas log fire, spilt system, loads of natural light, sky light, multiple water tanks and subdivision potential. Close to schools, shops, public transport, beaches, wineries and easy freeway access.
